name: getpostcode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uk_postcode.
Tool description: Integrate this API with your website's address form to quickly and accurately auto-fill UK postal addresses or find locations of addresses. This API contains a database of almost 1.7 million UK postcodes, along with address and location information.

For a simple demo, visit https://tomwimmenhove.com/ukpostcode/
API description: Retrieve details for a given UK postcode using the RapidAPI service.

postcode.description: An exact match for the post code to be queried
